title: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard Makes People Fall in Love with Taking Exercise
text: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard Makes People Fall in Love with Taking Exercise Taking exercise regularly is good to improve physical quality of people. Some people choose jogging in the open air, while others take exercise in gym. Both of them will gradually whittle down people’s passions because of monotonous modes. The advent of Airwheel M3 electric skateboard radically smashes traditional exercising modes and makes people fall in love with taking exercise. USA, 26 October 2015 -- Taking exercise regularly is good to improve the comprehensive physical quality of people. Some people choose jogging in the open air, but it is too monotonous if jogging for a long time. In the meantime, some people would like to take exercise in gym. However, playing with those stationary equipment every day will gradually whittle down people’s passions to exercise. The advent of Airwheel M3 electric skateboard radically smashes traditional exercising modes, which makes people fall in love with taking exercise from now on. From the name of Airwheel M3 electric skateboard, there are two meanings. On the one hand, it is a type of skateboard. On the other hand, it is driven by electricity. The latter is the difference between Airwheel M3 and traditional skateboards. At the same time, Airwheel M3 motorized skateboard relies on aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system to gain self-balancing. Therefore, riding Airwheel M3 is a piece of cake and users can control the basic operations by changing their body gravity. For instance, if skateboarders slightly lean backward, the built-in intelligent chips of Airwheel M3 will read the intention immediately and make M3 slow down. Besides, in order to give riders easier control, Airwheel M3 is equipped with a 2.4G wireless remote control and it can be controlled within 10m.Lots of people are attracted by the relaxing riding and easy control of Airwheel M3. They can play M3 anywhere, such as on the streets, in the park, in the campus, in the backyard or even in the drawing room. During the riding process, the muscles of four limbs, especially two legs, can be fully exercised. Moreover, the backbone, balance ability and flexibility will have all-round training. People who have cervical spondylopathy and humpback will be corrected if riding Airwheel M3 often. All in all, Airwheel M3 not only makes exercise more interesting, but also makes people healthier. # # #
